name: BasketBall Color
description:
Challenge your friends in this awesome game!


BasketBall color is a one touch arcade and addicting games top games where you must press a color and play color jump ball in surface tape ball colours

HOW TO PLAY:
The challenge of the game is to look at the color of the ball and touch it in the color palette, the tower will change color and the ball will bounce and change to a new color
